name: Bruce Firmware (BETA)
author: pr3y
description: Bruce is a custom firmware for the M5Stack Carduputer, designed to enhance its functionality and user experience. This beta version includes new features and improvements over the stock firmware.

name: Launcher
author: bmorcelli
description:
With this app you can turn your device into a swiss knife, loading any .bin you have on your SD Card or wirelessly downloading from M5Burner repo or from your computer/smartphone through its WebUI. 
Tutorial: https://youtu.be/odlHWZ03shI 
Support me: https://buymeacoffee.com/bmorcelliz 
Wiki: https://github.com/bmorcelli/Launcher/wiki/Obtaining-binaries-to-launch
